records.Tittle: Cometh The Hour, by Jeffrey Archer
records.Author: by Jeffrey Archer
records.Discription: Cometh the Hour opens with the reading of a suicide note, which has devastating consequences for Harry and Emma Clifton, Giles                     Barrington and Lady Virginia.
